items.title: The One Big Beautiful Bill Is an Opportunity to Renew Federalism
items.description: For the first time, states have the directive and flexibility to put the truly needy first and help able-bodied adults return to the workforce.

items.title: Sesame Street Will Still Be Open
items.description: It’s now on Netflix, and it remains available for free on PBS.

items.title: This Left-Wing Education Juggernaut Doesn’t Deserve Federal Backing
items.description: The National Education Association’s real purpose is political. That doesn’t merit a government charter.

items.title: Eddington Sensationalizes American Panic
items.description: Behind the miscommunication of a political exploitation film.

items.title: Trump Shouldn’t Fire Powell
items.description: The Fed chairman’s term will be over in ten months. Forcing him out now will mean serious institutional and reputational damage to the U.S.
